statements: SELECT * FROM VIPGuests;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM VIPGuests WHERE event_attended = 'Concert';
SELECT guest_name, arrival_time, seat_number FROM VIPGuests WHERE seat_number > 10;
SELECT guest_name, event_attended FROM VIPGuests WHERE guest_email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM VIPGuests ORDER BY arrival_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM VIPGuests ORDER BY guest_name DESC, arrival_time ASC
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM VIPGuests WHERE seat_number >= 10 AND event_attended LIKE '%concert%'
SELECT guest_id, guest_name, guest_email, arrival_time FROM VIPGuests WHERE arrival_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-03-31 23:59:59'
SELECT DISTINCT event_attended FROM VIPGuests WHERE guest_name LIKE 'A%' OR guest_name LIKE 'E%'
SELECT guest_name, arrival_time, seat_number FROM VIPGuests WHERE seat_number IN (5, 10, 15) ORDER BY arrival_time DESC
SELECT * FROM vip_guests;
SELECT guest_name, seating_position FROM vip_guests;
SELECT guest_name, seating_position FROM vip_guests ORDER BY guest_name DESC;
SELECT guest_name, seating_position FROM vip_guests WHERE seating_position='Front';
SELECT guest_name, seating_position FROM vip_guests WHERE seating_position='Front' ORDER BY guest_name ASC;
SELECT guest_name, seating_position FROM vip_guests ORDER BY guest_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM attendance_tracking WHERE event_date = '2022-01-15' AND check_in_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT guest_name, seating_position FROM vip_guests WHERE seating_position = 'Front Row' OR seating_position = 'VIP';
SELECT guest_name, event_date, check_in_time, check_out_time FROM vip_guests INNER JOIN attendance_tracking ON vip_guests.guest_id = attendance_tracking.guest_id;
SELECT guest_id, guest_name, seating_position FROM vip_guests WHERE guest_name LIKE '%John%' OR guest_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM VIP_Guests;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email, arrival_time FROM VIP_Guests WHERE guest_category = 'Platinum';
SELECT guest_id, guest_name, seating_table_id FROM VIP_Guests ORDER BY guest_name DESC;
SELECT AVG(table_capacity) AS average_capacity FROM Seating_Arrangements;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_time, check_out_time, attendance_status FROM VIP_Guests INNER JOIN Attendance_Log ON VIP_Guests.guest_id = Attendance_Log.guest_id;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM VIP_Guests WHERE guest_category='VIP' ORDER BY guest_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM VIP_Guests WHERE arrival_time >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY arrival_time DESC;
SELECT guest_name, table_description, table_capacity FROM VIP_Guests JOIN Seating_Arrangements ON VIP_Guests.seating_table_id = Seating_Arrangements.seating_table_id;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_time, attendance_status FROM VIP_Guests JOIN Attendance_Log ON VIP_Guests.guest_id = Attendance_Log.guest_id WHERE attendance_status='Attended';
SELECT guest_name, guest_email, check_in_time, check_out_time FROM VIP_Guests LEFT JOIN Attendance_Log ON VIP_Guests.guest_id = Attendance_Log.guest_id WHERE check_out_time IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM guests ORDER BY guest_id DESC;
SELECT guest_name, guest_arrival_time FROM guests WHERE seat_number = 3;
SELECT show_location FROM fashion_shows WHERE show_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT guest_name, seat_number FROM guests JOIN seating_arrangements ON guests.seat_number = seating_arrangements.seat_number;
SELECT guest_name, attendance_status FROM guests JOIN attendance ON guests.guest_id = attendance.guest_id WHERE attendance.show_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM guests ORDER BY guest_arrival_time DESC;
SELECT guest_name, seat_number FROM guests WHERE seat_number > 10;
SELECT show_location, show_date FROM fashion_shows WHERE show_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present' ORDER BY guest_id ASC;
SELECT guests.guest_name, attendance.attendance_status FROM guests JOIN attendance ON guests.guest_id = attendance.guest_id;
SELECT * FROM Guests;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM Guests;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email, guest_type FROM Guests WHERE guest_type = 'VIP';
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM Events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Guests
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM Guests WHERE guest_type = 'VIP'
SELECT * FROM Events WHERE event_date > '2023-01-01'
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT guest_name, event_name, check_in_time FROM GuestsAttendance JOIN Guests ON GuestsAttendance.guest_id = Guests.guest_id JOIN Events ON GuestsAttendance.event_id = Events.event_id
